name: RMC Governance
description: The DAO elected to manage staking-derived funds dedicated to recovery initiatives, focused on restoring and stabilizing depegged assets across the network through transparent, community-governed actions.

name: Developers DAO
description: A DAO responsible for generating dApp development requests for the Harmony network, evaluating proposals, and executing approved projects with community validation and oversight.

name: Think in Coin Governance
description: Think in Coin DAO is a decentralized governance model where the community collectively and transparently decides the direction of the ecosystem.

name: UtillityDAO
description: Bringing Utility to the Harmony ecosystem. Creators of uONE, a liquid staking solution, opening up the liquidity of Harmony's Open Consensus to the DeFi Space. UtilityDAO Validator supporting the network since q1 2026

name: Harmony Mainnet
description: Harmony is an open and fast blockchain. Our mainnet runs Ethereum applications with 2-second transaction finality and 100 times lower fees.

name: Validators DAO
description: A governance body composed of network validators, responsible for coordinating consensus-related decisions, proposing protocol improvements, and safeguarding the security, stability, and decentralization of the network.
